text: Vendor Security Specialists assess the cybersecurity posture of third-party providers. Their goals include enforcing contract clauses, reviewing SOC 2/ISO 27001 documentation, and coordinating vendor audits. They use GRC platforms, questionnaires, and legal input to manage vendor risks. Their tone is compliance-oriented and precise, and they prefer structured risk summaries and audit reports.

metadata.description: Manages third-party risk assessments and enforces security requirements in vendor relationships. Ensures external providers meet internal cybersecurity policies and regulatory requirements.
metadata.content_format: audit report or vendor risk matrix
sample_questions: How do I evaluate the security of a SaaS provider?
